resources.string: I am a Splash screen, look at me load!

Hey, you! Changing your username is a big deal! Changing it will generate an entirely new identity, which means none of your previous Shouts wil be linked to this new username.\n\nRemember, once you change your username, there is no going back.
Unable to save your shout. Please try again.
Unable to send your shout. Please reshout later.
Please register with MANES, the network used by Shout to exchange messages.
Please install the client for MANES, the network used by Shout to exchange messages.
Please update to the latest version of Shout available at http://whispercomm.org/manes/downloads/shout.apk. This version of Shout will no longer work.

To support our research on the types of communication protocols that make applications like Shout possible, we aggregate on our servers information that would be visible to your nearby neighbors when you Shout. The data collected consists of the content and the device location when a Shout is sent either by you or automatically by the Shout software. This data collection is only a temporary measure; once Shout is based on a true ad hoc network (rather than MANES), absolutely no data will be logged. We hope to reach this point as soon as possible, but we need to know how this version of Shout works to make progress, which is why we are requesting to store the data.\n\nFor more information, click here.
Allows the app to read or modify the shouts stored on your device.
